big-bazar.sellGoodsSelect: Select the goods you want to sell:
big-bazar.sellGoodsReward: Selling the selected goods gives you {{reward}} Lira.
big-bazar.sellGoodsBonusCard: Or, you can use your Bonus Card to sell any Good:
big-bazar.sellGoodsConfirmBonusCard: Play Bonus Card and Sell these Goods
big-bazar.caravansaryConfirmMessage: Draw 1 from the deck or take 1 from the discard pile?
big-bazar.confirmActionRequiringBonusCard: This action requires you to play a Bonus Card. Are you sure?
big-bazar.noActionsLeft: There are no more actions you can perform. End your turn when you are ready.
big-bazar.computerExplanation: (BETA) I just move and end turn for now, sorry!
big-bazar.rubiesPopover: Indicates the number of rubies of the player. To win, a player needs to be the first to acquire all the rubies.
big-bazar.liraPopover: Amount of Lira (currency) the player has.

mosqueTile.PAY_2_LIRA_TO_RETURN_ASSISTANT: Pay 2 Lira to return an assistant

instructions.DISCARD_BONUS_CARD: Select one of your Bonus Cards to discard
instructions.MOVE: Select a Place to move your Merchant to
instructions.SEND_FAMILY_MEMBER: Select a Place to send your Family Member to
instructions.PAY_2_LIRA_TO_RETURN_ASSISTANT: Select a Place to return your assistent from
instructions.RETURN_1_ASSISTANT: Select a Place to return your assistent from

buttons.BONUS_CARD_BUY_RUBY: Play Bonus Card to buy another ruby
buttons.BONUS_CARD_DELIVER_TO_SULTAN: Play Bonus Card to deliver goods to the Sultan again
buttons.BONUS_CARD_TAKE_5_LIRA: Play Bonus Card to take 5 Lira
buttons.BONUS_CARD_GAIN_1_GOOD: Play Bonus Card to take 1 Good
buttons.BONUS_CARD_USE_POST_OFFICE: Play Bonus Card to use the Post Office again
buttons.CATCH_FAMILY_MEMBER_FOR_BONUS_CARD: Catch Family Member and take Bonus Card
buttons.TAKE_BONUS_CARD_CARAVANSARY: Take Bonus Card (from deck or discard pile)
buttons.PLACE_MEMBER_ON_POLICE_STATION: Send Family Member to Police Station

descriptions.BONUS_CARD_BUY_RUBY: Play Bonus Card to buy another ruby
descriptions.BONUS_CARD_DELIVER_TO_SULTAN: Play Bonus Card to deliver goods to the Sultan again
descriptions.BONUS_CARD_TAKE_5_LIRA: Play Bonus Card to take 5 Lira
descriptions.BONUS_CARD_GAIN_1_GOOD: Play Bonus Card to take 1 Good
descriptions.BONUS_CARD_USE_POST_OFFICE: Play Bonus Card to use the Post Office again
descriptions.CATCH_FAMILY_MEMBER_FOR_BONUS_CARD: Catch Family Member and take Bonus Card
descriptions.NO_REROLL_FOR_BLUE_GOODS: Turn die (if possible) and take blue goods
descriptions.TAKE_BONUS_CARD_CARAVANSARY: Take Bonus Card (from deck or discard pile)
descriptions.PLACE_MEMBER_ON_POLICE_STATION: Send Family Member to Police Station

bonusCards.FAMILY_MEMBER_TO_POLICE_STATION: Send Family Member to Police Station and collect reward
bonusCards.GEMSTONE_DEALER_2X: If you carry out the action at the Gemstone Dealer, after completing the action, carry it out one more time.
bonusCards.MOVE_0: In the 1st phase of your turn, do not move your Merchant.
bonusCards.MOVE_3_OR_4: In the 1st phase of your turn, move your Merchant stack by 3 or 4 Places (instead of 1 or 2).
bonusCards.POST_OFFICE_2X: If you carry out the action at the Post Office, after completing the action, carry it out one more time.
bonusCards.RETURN_1_ASSISTANT: In the 1st phase of your turn, return 1 of your assistants to your Merchant stack.
bonusCards.SMALL_MARKET_ANY_GOOD: If you carry out the action at the Small Market, you have to sell the required number of goods but you may use other types of goods than required.
bonusCards.SULTAN_2X: If you carry out the action at the Sultanâ€™s Palace 13 , after completing the action, carry it out one more time.
bonusCards.TAKE_5_LIRA: Take 5 Lira from the general supply.

errors.ALREADY_HAS_MOSQUE_TILE: You already have this Mosque Tile.
errors.MOSQUE_TILE_NOT_AVAILABLE: This Mosque Tile is not available.
errors.NOT_AT_PLACE: Your Merchant is not at the right Place.
errors.NO_RUBY_AVAILABLE: There is no Ruby available at this Place.
errors.DOESNT_HAVE_BONUS_CARD: You don't have the required Bonus Card.
errors.NO_ACTION: There is no action you can perform.
errors.NO_FAMILY_MEMBER_TO_CATCH: There is no family member to catch.
errors.CANNOT_ADD_EXTENSION: You cannot add more extensions to your wheelbarrow.
errors.ALREADY_AT_PLACE: You are already at this place.

log.TURNED_DIE: uses Mosque tile to turn a die
log.MAY_PAY_2_LIRA_FOR_1_ADDITIONAL_GOOD: may pay 2 Lira for 1 additional good
log.MAY_TURN_OR_REROLL_DICE: may turn a die or reroll
log.PLAY_LEFTOVER_BONUS_CARDS: everybody may play left over bonus cards

value.PAY_2_LIRA_TO_RETURN_ASSISTANT: Pay 2 Lira to return an assistant
value.SMALL_MARKET_ANY_GOOD: Sell any Good in Small Market
